Contributor: Kemp-Welch, Lucy, 1869-1958, artist.; David Allen & Sons, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Signed "E. Kemp-Welch". "Poster No. 41" appears on the bottom left. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: The title refers to the German naval bombardment of Scarborough, .  The text says to enlist now. Illustration shows a symbolic women, in robes and holding a sword, leading the recruits.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 41.

Title: Remember Scarborough!
